command_or_file:
create or replace view litmanen.features.litmanen_features as
select
  season, club, league,
  player_matches, player_minutes,
  max_league_matches, max_minutes,
  player_matches*1.0/nullif(max_league_matches,0) as workload_index,
  player_minutes*1.0/nullif(max_minutes,0) as minutes_ratio
from litmanen.raw.player_season_data;
notes: Create schema litmanen.features first.
